medical_history.chief_complaint: Episodic right flank and RUQ pain.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began a week ago, becoming progressively worse, with 3 episodes occurring about 2 hours after eating. Pain is sharp, severe, and non-remitting. Associated nausea without vomiting. The current episode started 13 hours prior to the consult. No similar pain noted prior to these episodes.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dyslipidemia; patient recently stopped HRT and did not tolerate statins due to myopathy.
medical_history.family_history: Notable for melanoma in her mother, chronic heart disease in her father, and cancer in her sister.
